definitions.title: Def
definitions.body: †[[[מוּר]]] vb. change (NH id., Hiph.; Ar. ma0ra (med. [[ו]]) is move to and fro (intransitive); ma0ra (med. [[י]]) procure food, Aram. mor buy or import food, N?:ZMG xi. 1886, 154);—

definitions.title: Niph.
definitions.body: Pf. [[נׇמָָר]] (as if fr. [[מרר]]) be changed, Je 48:11 subj. [[רֵיחוֹ]] (of wine, fig. of Moab);

change, alter, Mic 2:4 (obj. [[חֵלֶק עַמִּי]]; but LXX [[יִמַּד בַּחֶבֶל]], so Sta:ZAW 1886, 122 f.); Ps 15:4 (no obj. expr.); Hiph. declar. Ps 46:3 ([[ארץ]] subj., Hup Che Bae al., Ges:§ 115, 2, R. 2) when the earth shews change; Krochm Gr prop. [[הִמּוֹג]] (cf. [[מוג]] v:Ps 46:7 ‖[[מוט]]), but needless.

exchange (sq. acc. of obj. relinquished, + [[בְּ]] before obj. acquired) Le 27:10, Le 27:10, Le 27:10, Le 27:10 (2 t. as Inf. abs.); Ho 4:7, Ps 106:20; cf. c. one obj. Le 27:33, Le 27:33, Le 27:33 (once as Inf. abs.); Je 21:11, Je 21:11 (cf. supr.); without obj. Ez Eze 48:14 (but Ew Co [[יוּמַר]], Hoph.).

definitions.title: Hoph.
definitions.body: Impf. [[יוּמַר]] Ez Eze 48:14 Ew Co, cf. Berthol.
